data.name: Echo Tokyo: Phoenix
data.detailed_description:
Echo Tokyo: Phoenix follows Shizume Misaki as she tries to escape her past and make a name for herself in a dark vision of the future.

It is said that a Fixer will take any job as long as the price is right.

Living within the city you will be able to interact with its citizens, make friends, allies and enemies. Build relationships and possibly find romance. Work jobs, investigate crimes, help others to make your way in the world. Or find your way into the darker side of the city where you might need to steal, kill and accept jobs from some of the most depraved of people all to survive in this dark dystopian cyber punk city.

The game features an ongoing campaign that will adjust based on the decisions you make from one moment to the next, featuring multiple branching story-lines where your decisions will affect not just your survival but others and the world around you.

data.short_description: Live inside a cyber punk city. Where there is no law. Choose your own way to survive in this visual novel following the exploits of Shizume Misaki looking to survive by any means possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
